casebody.data:
Christopher EVANS
v.
TIGER CLAW, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017 Mariusz Kurzyna and Peter Goselin, in support of the petition. Taryn D. Martin and Robert A. Ziegler, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn. App. 409 , 163 A.3d 1282 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
